text:
Google, Apple, and Microsoft are well-known giants in software, but they're not the only ones. In my search for opportunities, I often felt lost and without guidance. That's why I created this channel to explore and highlight other software companies
@_buildspace @_nightsweekends https://t.co/lUhZfrpwqw
